name: On-Bill Recovery Loan
description: The On-Bill Recovery Loan allows homeowners to finance energy efficiency improvements and repay the loan through their utility bill.

description_langs.es: El Préstamo de Recuperación en la Factura permite a los propietarios financiar mejoras de eficiencia energética y reembolsar el préstamo a través de su factura de servicios públicos.

financial_authority.name: New York State Energy Research and Development Authority (NYSERDA)
financial_authority.description: NYSERDA offers financing options to help New York State residents make energy efficiency improvements to their homes.

name: Smart Energy Loan
description: NYSERDA provides financing options for energy efficiency improvements, including heating, cooling, weatherization, and solar projects for New York State residents.

description_langs.es: NYSERDA ofrece opciones de financiamiento para mejoras de eficiencia energética, incluyendo calefacción, refrigeración, climatización y proyectos solares para los residentes del estado de Nueva York.

financial_authority.name: New York State Energy Research and Development Authority (NYSERDA)
financial_authority.description: NYSERDA offers financing options to help New York State residents make energy efficiency improvements to their homes.
